DOC.brief_summary: The objective study investigate immunogenicity safety FSME-IMMUN 0.5 ml two age stratum ( stratum A : 16 49 year , stratum B : > 50 year ) , first second vaccination administer accord rapid immunization schedule ( 12 Â± 2 day apart ) . The third vaccination administer approximately 6 month first dose .
DOC.brief_title: Immunogenicity Safety Study FSME-IMMUN 0.5 mL Adult Subjects Previously Vaccinated According Rapid Immunization Schedule
DOC.criteria: Male female subject eligible participation study : Understand nature study , agree provision provide write informed consent ( assent subject 18 year age ) ; Provide write informed consent parent / legal guardian ( subject 18 year age ) ; Are age > = 16 year ( 16th birthday ) screening ; Are clinically healthy , ( i.e . physician would reservations vaccinate FSMEIMMUN 0.5 ml outside scope clinical trial ) ; Have negative pregnancy test result first medical examination ( female capable bearing child ) ; Agree employ adequate birth control measure duration study ( female capable bearing child ) ; Agree keep Subject Diary . Subjects exclude participation study : Have history previous tickborne encephalitis ( TBE ) vaccination ; Have history TBE infection ; Have history infection vaccination flavivirus ( e.g . dengue fever , yellow fever , Japanese Bencephalitis ) ; Have history allergic reaction , particular one component vaccine ; Suffer disease ( e.g . autoimmune disease ) undergo form treatment ( e.g . systemic corticosteroid ) expect influence immunological function ; Have know suspect problem drug alcohol abuse ( > 4 liter wine / week equivalent level alcoholic beverage ) ; Have donate blood plasma within 30 day study entry ; Have receive blood transfusion immunoglobulin within 30 day study entry ; Are know HIV positive ( HIV test require specifically purpose study ) ; Are simultaneously participate another clinical trial include administration investigational product ; Have participate clinical study within six week prior study entry ; Are pregnant breastfeeding ( female ) ; Are member team conduct study dependent relationship study investigator . Dependent relationship include close relative ( i.e. , child , partner/spouse , sibling , parent ) well employee investigator . Have receive vaccination within two week prior study entry .
